title: [Rambling Meadows, Hilltop]
description: The grass has been trampled and overturned in this area, creating a small clearing of broken foliage and loose dirt.  An elongated animal skull gazes coldly out from its half-buried home within the upturned earth.

The grass has been trampled and overturned in this area, creating a small clearing of broken foliage and loose dirt.  Apparently the site of a violent skirmish, a few pale bones and bits of tattered skin are scattered amid the disturbed tufts of grass.  An elongated animal skull gazes coldly out from its half-buried home within the upturned earth.

The grass has been trampled and overturned in this area, creating a small clearing of broken foliage and loose dirt.  Apparently the site of a violent skirmish, a few yellowed bones and bits of tattered skin are scattered amid the disturbed tufts of grass.  An elongated animal skull gazes coldly out from its half-buried home within the upturned earth.
paths: Obvious paths: north, southwest, west, northwest
